reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits true to size, with one mentioning it's oversized with long sleeves, and appreciate its lightweight, comfortable, and soft feel. The style receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's perfect for spring, and they like the colors, with one confirming they match the product images. The quality is good, though opinions about material thickness are mixed, with some finding it n

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cozy-cute sweater for Fall!
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised by how much I love this striped sweater! Right out of the package it felt soft, not scratchy, and had that perfectly relaxed, slightly oversized fit that makes fall outfits so easy. The color-block stripes look exactly like the photos—modern, flattering, and just bold enough to feel stylish without being loud. The knit is lightweight but warm, great for those early fall days when the temps bounce around. I’ve worn it with jeans, leggings, and even tucked into a skirt, and it works every time. The crewneck is comfortable and sits nicely, and the sleeve length is perfect for a cozy look. After a couple of washes, it has held its shape and softness—no shrinking, no weird stretching, no pilling. Honestly, it feels like something I’d find at a more expensive boutique. If you want a casual, comfy, stylish staple for fall 2025, this is a winner. I’m already eyeing another color! Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute perfect fall sweater
items.body: Lightweight cute and fit perfectly. Thin and perfect for those early fall days. Got lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: Kelley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pretty sweater for spring
items.body: A nice sweater. Fits loose and as described. Took one star off bc I wish it were a bit thicker. This is not a fall or winter sweater. More like spring or summer. It's light. For reference I am 5'2" tall and 115lbs. I bought the small. Read more
items.author: LA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute striped sweater
items.body: Cute striped sweater. I love red and pinks together. Thinner sweater material so not overly hot. Isn't oversized, so for a looser fit you may want to size up. Soft material. Read more
items.author: Brynley Flynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: This is a great light sweater, so comfy and faltering. Material is on the thinner side, but it Holds shape good and isn’t boxy, and washes well.. several color options and fits true to size.. great shirt for the price! I’m 5’4” 120 pounds and I am wearing a small! Read more
items.author: Mel S. Crow

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed — looser and lower quality than expected
items.body: 2.5 stars - I only wore this shirt once and was disappointed with the overall look and quality. I ordered a Medium. I’m 5'7", 135 lbs, C+ cup — and while it is a loose fit shirt as shown on the model, the details did not match what I expected. The arms/cuffs are much looser than they appear in the photos, which made the shirt feel more sloppy than casual. The material is very lightweight, but not in a high-quality way — it felt like it stretched out quickly, and the orange color faded noticeably after one wash. I buy a ton of clothes online, mostly with good to great reviews bc I take the time to evaluate photos and reviews. I had high hopes for this one, but am disappointed. Overall, it looked and felt like a low-end shirt and did not match the purchase price. Read more
items.author: CA Purchaser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: Great sweater! Really cute with black leggings. Light weight, perfect for travel. Read more
items.author: Gigi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, cute sweater at a great price!
items.body: Such a cute sweater! I'm partial to coral and love that the accent color is a vivid coral. Couldn't decide on a M or L and went with the medium which fits great - loose in the body, a bit more fitted in the sleeves. A great addition to my fall wardrobe, especially in the southeast where we're having a Hotober! Read more
items.author: Lee

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Green, Red White Apricot, Grey White Orange, Black White Orange, Grey White Apricot, Black White Apricot, Black White Blue, Red White Pink, Blue White Pink, Blue White Yellow, Apricot White Orange, Brown White Orange, Apricot White Grey, White Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
